mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_SCATEGORY (S_NO, S_NAME, S_YEAR, S_QUARTER, S_MONTH, S_DAY, L_NO) VALUES (S_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{sName}, #{sYear}, #{sQuarter}, #{sMonth}, #{sDay}, #{lNo})
mapper.select: SELECT S.S_NO, S.S_NAME, S.S_YEAR, S.S_QUARTER, S.S_MONTH, S.S_DAY, L.L_NAME,J.JOB_NAME, G.JG_NAME, L.L_NO, J.JOB_NO, G.JG_NO FROM TBL_SCATEGORY S, TBL_LCATEGORY L, TBL_JOB J, TBL_JOBGROUP G WHERE ( S.L_NO = L.L_NO AND L.JOB_NO = J.JOB_NO AND J.JG_NO = G.JG_NO AND S_NO = #{sNo} ) OR (S_NO = 999)
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_SCATEGORY SET S_NAME = #{sName}, S_YEAR = #{sYear}, S_QUARTER = #{sQuarter}, S_MONTH = #{sMonth}, S_DAY = #{sDay}, L_NO = #{lNo} WHERE S_NO = #{sNo}
mapper.select: SELECT S.S_NO, S.S_NAME, L.L_NAME, J.JOB_NAME, G.JG_NAME FROM TBL_SCATEGORY S, TBL_LCATEGORY L, TBL_JOB J, TBL_JOBGROUP G WHERE S.L_NO = L.L_NO AND L.JOB_NO = J.JOB_NO AND J.JG_NO = G.JG_NO
SELECT JOB_NO, JOB_NAME, JG_NO FROM TBL_JOB WHERE JG_NO = #{jgNo}

select a.l_no, a.l_name, b.job_name, b.jg_name from TBL_LCATEGORY a inner join (select job_name, jg_name, a.job_no from tbl_job a inner join tbl_jobgroup b on a.JG_NO = b.jg_no) b on a.JOB_NO = b.job_no AND a.JOB_NO = #{jobNo}
